abstract.para: Discharge is measured on streams draining catchments with noburn treatment (N20B). Measurements are taken at 5 minute intervals at a triangular throated flume. The prairie streams are 3rd-order and are intermittent. Daily and stormflow discharge records are available.

intellectualRights.para: While substantial efforts are made to ensure the accuracy of data and documentation, complete accuracy of data sets cannot be guaranteed. All data are made available "as is". All data users are required to fill the Data Access Form to download data in order to enable data providers to track usage, evaluate its impact in the community, and confirm users&rsquo acceptance.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: The location of N20B on the Konza Prairie Biological Station

section.title: Stream discharge at N20B
section.para: Campbell data logger used logging at 5 min intervals. Depth measured manually at site and offset collected manually weekly.
Gauge height transformed to discharge, daily averages minimum, maximum and associated times all calculated with in-house program

samplingDescription.para: Samples are collected at 5 minute intervals
